IronJacamar Embedded

The IronJacamar Embedded configuration allows developers to use a Java EE Connector Architecture container inside their application, or use it for a unit testing infrastructure.

IronJacamar Embedded provides a full Java EE Connector Architecture standalone environment, as defined by Section 3.5 in the specification.

Furthermore it provides integration to the following technologies:

  • Arquillian
  • ShrinkWrap
  • Byteman

See the user guide for furher information.

Package overview

The IronJacamar Embedded configuration contains different packages, which focuses on different parts of the setup.

org.jboss.jca.embedded

This is the main package of the embedded platform with core classes.

This package should be considered advanced usage.

org.jboss.jca.embedded.arquillian

This package contains the classes to control configuration and integration of IronJacamar Embedded with Arquillian.

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl

This package contains generic classes for DSL integration.

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.datasources10.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a datasources_1_0.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/datasources_1_0.xsd

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.datasources11.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a datasources_1_1.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/datasources_1_1.xsd

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.datasources12.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a datasources_1_2.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/datasources_1_2.xsd

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.datasources13.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a datasources_1_3.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/datasources_1_3.xsd

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.ironjacamar10.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for an ironjacamar_1_0.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/ironjacamar_1_0.xsd

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.ironjacamar11.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for an ironjacamar_1_1.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/ironjacamar_1_1.xsd

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.ironjacamar12.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for an ironjacamar_1_2.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/ironjacamar_1_2.xsd

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.resourceadapters10.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a resource-adapters_1_0.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/resource-adapters_1_0.xsd

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.resourceadapters11.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a resource-adapters_1_1.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/resource-adapters_1_1.xsd

org.jboss.jca.embedded.dsl.resourceadapters12.api

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a resource-adapters_1_2.xsd deployment.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/resource-adapters_1_2.xsd

org.jboss.shrinkwrap.descriptor.api.connector10

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a Java EE Connector Architecture 1.0 descriptor.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/connector_1_0.dtd

org.jboss.shrinkwrap.descriptor.api.connector15

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a Java EE Connector Architecture 1.5 descriptor.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/connector_1_5.xsd

org.jboss.shrinkwrap.descriptor.api.connector16

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a Java EE Connector Architecture 1.6 descriptor.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/connector_1_6.xsd

org.jboss.shrinkwrap.descriptor.api.connector17

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for a Java EE Connector Architecture 1.7 descriptor.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/connector_1_7.xsd

org.jboss.shrinkwrap.descriptor.api.j2ee14

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for the Java EE 1.4 descriptor, which is used by the Java EE Connector Architecture 1.5 descriptor.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/j2ee_1_4.xsd

org.jboss.shrinkwrap.descriptor.api.javaee6

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for the Java EE 6 descriptor, which is used by the Java EE Connector Architecture 1.6 descriptor.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/javaee_6.xsd

org.jboss.shrinkwrap.descriptor.api.javaee7

This package contains the ShrinkWrap/Descriptors API for the Java EE 7 descriptor, which is used by the Java EE Connector Architecture 1.7 descriptor.

The schema can be found here: http://www.ironjacamar.org/doc/schema/javaee_7.xsd
